itemListElement.name: 1 Pot Cannellini and Black Bean Chili Recipe

@graph.name: 1 Pot Cannellini and Black Bean Chili Recipe
@graph.description: White and Black Bean Chili Recipe. Make this Hot bowl of Chili with Black Beans and White Cannellini or Northern Beans, peppers, veggies for Fall. 1 Pot, ready in 30 minutes. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1  bell pepper (chopped, ( 1/2 of green and half red))
3/4 tsp or more salt (depends on if the beans were salted)
1 15 oz can black beans (drained , or use 1.5 cups cooked)
1 15 oz can white beans (cannellini or great northern beans (drained, or use 1.5 cups cooked)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook for 5 mins. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook for 5 mins. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add peppers and spices and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add peppers and spices and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add lime juice, tomato, tomato paste, salt and mix in. At this point you can add other chopped fall veggies or squash and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add lime juice, tomato, tomato paste, salt and mix in. At this point you can add other chopped fall veggies or squash and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the beans, salt and water. Mix, cover and cook for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the beans, salt and water. Mix, cover and cook for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and heat. (optional: Add 1/2 tsp herbs like sage or thyme. Add a 1/2 tsp sugar to balance the flavor.)
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and heat. (optional: Add 1/2 tsp herbs like sage or thyme. Add a 1/2 tsp sugar to balance the flavor.)

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer for another 5 to 10 mins or until desired consistency. Garnish with cilantro, avocado or vegan sour cream and some crusty bread or tortilla chips.
recipeInstructions.name: Simmer for another 5 to 10 mins or until desired consistency. Garnish with cilantro, avocado or vegan sour cream and some crusty bread or tortilla chips.
